info.name: UIA-Backend API
info.description:
# UI Alumni App API Documentation

Welcome to the API documentation for the **UI Alumni App**. This documentation provides comprehensive information on how to integrate and utilize the various endpoints and functionalities offered by the API.

## Overview

The UI Alumni App API is designed to enable developers to interact with the UI Alumni App ecosystem. It allows developers to access and manage data related to the Alumni of University of Ibadan.
